properties.description: This will use Device Discovery to onboard a device in Catalyst Center

actions.name: Get Catalyst Center all global credentials v2
actions.title: Get Credentials

properties.description: Transformation Data based on known information
properties.script:
#Set DiscoveryType for Discovery
DeviceArray = ('$workflow.definition_workflow_02NKLLJF0R2KQ2fcFFyFOSlBB4D0QGESlvC.input.variable_workflow_02NKLLJGDZ4PK6FBL8M6mnNflNboKpmvkGh$').split(',')
if len(DeviceArray) > 1:
    DiscoveryType = 'Multi Range'
else:
    DiscoveryType = 'Range'

#Set the DeviceRanges for the Discovery
WorkingRange = []
for index, ip in enumerate(DeviceArray):
    WorkingRange.append(f'{ip}-{ip}')

# Join the elements in DeviceRange with a comma and space
DeviceRange = ', '.join(WorkingRange)

#output to AO
print(DiscoveryType)
print(DeviceRange)

actions.name: Remove Catalyst Center discovery by id
actions.title: Remove Discovery

properties.description: Extract the Discovery Id from the Task

actions.name: Get Catalyst Center discovered network devices by discovery id
actions.title: Get Discovered Devices

properties.script:
import json

devices_list = []
deviceUuid_list = []
for index, item in enumerate($activity.definition_activity_02NKLLM9H4QYI06LJH8xQD9UvfSZi28sILn.output.body.response$):
    devices_list.append(item['managementIpAddress'])
    deviceUuid_list.append(item['id'])
result1 = ', '.join(devices_list)
result2 = ', '.join(deviceUuid_list)
print(result1)
print(result2)
